title:
So, if I actually hear the Brunswick Nuclear Powerplant warning sirens go off - and it\'s NOT during a drill - what am I suppose to do? I live in Carolina Beach and I\'m less than a mile from one of the large sirens.



Justin
text:
Here are a couple of links that might help answer your
question. One is a FEMA site with general information about nuclear
safety and the other is a link to a Progress Energy site with more
specific information about the Brunswick plant.

http://www.fema.gov/hazard/nuclear/index.shtm

http://progress-energy.com/aboutenergy/powerplants/brunswick.pdf
